## hpr3444 :: The Psion series 5mx

 The psion series 5mx is a portable computer from the late 90s, here's my episode talking about it.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Psion_Series_5
PLPTools (syncing with modern linux): https://github.com/rrthomas/plptools
Nconvert (file converter): https://web.archive.org/web/20161130192611/https://neuon.com/downloads/nconvert/
Programming book: https://archive.org/details/book_20210531
psion linux SDK: https://github.com/static-void/psion_cpp_sdk_linux.git
Eric Lindsey's site, with lots of psion software: https://ericlindsay.com/epoc/index.htm

Apologies for talking quickly!
